text: Asnières-sur-Saône is a commune. It is found in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region in the Ain department in the east of France. In 2009, 73 people lived in the commune. The inhabitants are the Asniérois. Famous people from Asnières-sur-Saône include José Mingret, a French painter in the 20th century who was inhumated there. The commune has been twinned with Bad Waldsee in Germany since 1991. Category:Communes in Ain
title: Asnières-sur-Saône
